> Jonathan: You had better help/be in charge of role-playing 101.
> Especially when you just start you don't want your characters to
> die.

Actually I don't really care if Panthos dies or Shade dies. Like I finished
saying I play tragic heroes best, ones that die and stay dead and only come
back when and only when its through damn good roleplaying (and not mine
either, the only one that has died and come back and stayed back in my
example was brought back by everyone in the current storyline...I was quite
prepared to write him off  myself :) minotaur who is literally picked up and
cracked nearly in half over a giants knee isn't coming back by himself by
any means)

As for helping with roleplaying 101, sure I'd be glad to anything to help
the game. :)

And how does a bot get a scar? Really crappy welding job? ;-) hehehe
